snippet.title: PINPIN BALLBALL - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
Check out this new pinball game created with Pixel Game Maker MV!
Use the left and right flippers to send the ball flying and shoot for the highest score!
This simple minigame was created using Pixel Game Maker MV, which allows anyone to create their very own original action games with ease.

Created with Pixel Game Maker MV!

Pixel Game Maker Series, Pixel Game Maker MV, PINPIN BALLBALL (C) Gotcha Gotcha Games

It's free on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/891180/PINPIN_BALLBALL/

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #pixelgamemakermv #pixelgamemakerseries #playism #kadokawa #kadokawacorporation #pinball #pinballgames
